thread.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary says he does not expect trade war

title: U.S. Treasury Secretary says he does not expect trade war
text:
U.S. Treasury Secretary says he does not expect trade war 9:59pm IST - 01:08 
U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said on Sunday there was a risk of a trade war between the United States and China after the countries proposed imposing tariffs on billions of dollars worth of one another's goods, but that he did not expect one. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
